# Maven and Gradle build directories
/target/
/build/

# IntelliJ IDEA
.idea/
*.iml
*.iws
out/

# Eclipse
.project
.classpath
.settings/

# VS Code
.vscode/

# Logs
*.log

# OS-specific files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Spring Boot specific
spring.log

# Local environment files
.env
.env.*

# Dependency directories
/.mvn/
.gradle/
!gradle-wrapper.jar

# Files generated by build tools
*.jar
*.war
*.ear

# Application-specific
*.class
*.jar
*.war
*.ear

# JUnit or TestNG reports
test-outputs/
test-results/

# Temporary files
*.tmp
*.swp
*.swo
*.swn

# JetBrains Rider files
.idea/.idea.*
